name: PM-KISAN
description: Income support for farmers with up to 2 hectares of cultivable land.
eligibility: Farmer with cultivable land ≤ 2 hectares and Aadhaar linked.

name: MGNREGA
description: 100 days of guaranteed wage employment (150 days for FRA holders).
eligibility: Any rural household with a valid job card.

name: PMAY-Gramin
description: Housing scheme for people without a permanent house.
eligibility: Rural poor without pucca house, FRA holders eligible.
benefits: Financial aid to build pucca house.

name: Jal Jeevan Mission
description: Functional tap water connections to rural households.
eligibility: Village with low tap water coverage and community FRA.

name: PM-JUGA
eligibility: Village with ≥50% ST population and ≥500 population.

name: PMJAY - Ayushman Bharat
description: Health insurance for poor and vulnerable households.
eligibility: Poor households as per SECC, FRA households eligible.
benefits: ₹5 lakh health cover per family per year.
